messageSplitter.dataXPath: Organization_Roots/Organization_Root[(Organization_Ratings/Organization_Rating[Rating_Class_Number > 0 and Duration_Short_Description='LT'] [Security_Class_Short_Description='CLM' or Security_Class_Short_Description='CRR' or Security_Class_Short_Description='CTP' or Security_Class_Short_Description='SCD' or Security_Class_Short_Description='SI' or Security_Class_Short_Description='BCA' or Security_Class_Short_Description='ADJ' ]) or (Organization_Ratings/Organization_Rating[(Rating_Class_Number =-10200 or Rating_Class_Number=-200) and Duration_Short_Description='LT'] [Security_Class_Short_Description='REG' ])]
